ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Acquisition_Type_Acquisition__c , Acquisition_Type_Reacquisition__c ), OR( Project_Capacity_Group_Anchor__c, Project_Capacity_Group_Non_Anchor__c, Project_Type_Acquisition_Management__c, Project_Type_Management_Only__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Management_Fee_Trigger__c,"")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Management_Fee_Type__c,"")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this is an acquisition fee, do not populate management fee fields
